text:
Hi here,
I understand that hubdb allow us to restore the last published version. I would like to understand, if it is possible to restore the data from few versions / published ago?

Yep. So you can have say 10000 rows in your table and make 10 of your pages "dynamic":
• <https://www.foo.com/page1/row1>
• ...
• <https://www.foo.com/page1/row10000>
• ...
• <https://www.foo.com/page10/row1>
• ...
• <https://www.foo.com/page10/row10000>
Like that
Use cases for having more than 1 page be dynamically linked to the same HubDB table are rare
